text: "Mysterious Ways" is a 1991 song by Irish rock band U2 and is the second single from their seventh studio album Achtung Baby. It went to number 1 in Canada, Portugal, Italy and Ireland, number 13 in the United Kingdom, Switzerland and the Netherlands, number 3 in New Zealand, Australia and Greece and number 46 in Germany. ==Formats and track listings== ==References== Category:1991 songs Category:U2 songs Category:Snow Patrol songs Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Alternative dance songs Category:Funk rock songs
title: Mysterious Ways (song)
